title: Batch Processing Performance Degradation
description: Overnight batch job processing window exceeded by 4 hours, causing end-of-day reconciliation reports to be delayed from the targeted delivery time of 6 AM to an actual delivery time of 10 AM. No direct customer impact was observed as these reports are used internally only; however, downstream analytics dashboards showed stale data for a period, and the Treasury team's daily liquidity analysis was delayed by 3 hours.

root_cause.primary_cause: Outdated database table statistics leading to poor query plans. One reconciliation query scanned 500M rows instead of using an index (expected 50K rows).

preventive_measures: Add query performance monitoring with alerting.
Review all batch queries for optimization opportunities.
